articles.author: Science X
articles.title: How an African bird might inspire a better water bottle - Phys.org
articles.description: An extreme closeup of feathers from a bird with an uncanny ability to hold water while it flies could inspire the next generation of absorbent materials.
articles.content:
An extreme closeup of feathers from a bird with an uncanny ability to hold water while it flies could inspire the next generation of absorbent materials.
With high resolution microscopes and 3D tech… [+5231 chars]
